alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 12 at 12:22PM PDT until April 13 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 28 and 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast, this includes the cities of Reedsport, Lakeside, Coos Bay, Bandon, Coquille, Myrtle Point, and Powers. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
